rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var keyDashboard = new Datum(); \u000avar nameDashboard = new Datum();\u000avar keyReport = new Datum(); \u000avar nameReport = new Datum();\u000a\u000akeyDashboard.setType(8);\u000anameDashboard .setType(8);\u000akeyReport .setType(8);\u000anameReport .setType(8);\u000a \u000a vars[\"$rpsch.dashboard.key\"] = keyDashboard;\u000a vars[\"$rpsch.dashboard.display\"] = nameDashboard;\u000a vars[\"$rpsch.report.key\"] = keyReport;\u000a vars[\"$rpsch.report.display\"] = nameReport;\u000a\u000alib.reportscheduleHelp.setupReportNames(vars['$L.file'].inbox_dashboard, vars['$L.file'].inbox_report);\u000alib.reportscheduleRule.initReportScheduleRule(vars['$L.file']);\u000a\u000avar ownerLogin = new Datum();\u000aownerLogin.setType(8);\u000aownerLogin.push(vars['$L.file'].owner);\u000avars['$owner.login.names']=ownerLogin ;\u000avars['$owner.full.names'] = lib.reportscheduleHelp.getOperatorContactNames( vars['$owner.login.names']);\u000a\u000avars['$emailto.login.names']=vars['$L.file'].email_to_users;\u000avars['$emailto.full.names'] = lib.reportscheduleHelp.getOperatorContactNames(vars['$emailto.login.names']);"}
